markdown.body:
<style>
.chart-container {
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
}
.blurred-img {
    filter: blur(6px);
    pointer-events: none;
}
.overlay-text {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    font-size: 24px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: white;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
    padding: 10px 20px;
    border-radius: 8px;
}
</style>
